TemplateConfiguration._Description: Creates an ASP.NET MVC Master Page.

TemplateFiles.File:
<%@ Master Language="C#" Inherits="System.Web.Mvc.ViewMasterPage" %> <!DOCTYPE html> <html> <head runat="server"> <asp:ContentPlaceHolder ID="head" runat="server"> <title></title> </asp:ContentPlaceHolder> </head> <body> <asp:ContentPlaceHolder ID="MainContent" runat="server">
</asp:ContentPlaceHolder> </body> </html>
